statements: DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM sentiment_results WHERE id = 100 AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 50 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 123 AND notifications_enabled = TRUE;
DELETE FROM UserInteractions WHERE action_type = 'like' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM analysis_history WHERE user_id = 100 AND analysis_date = '2021-10-15';
